channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: How I Implemented Full-Text Search On My Website
item.description: This article walks you through how I used Lunr.js to add powerful search capabilities to a Next.js static site, dealing with challenges like client-side processing and optimizing for performance along the way. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/how-i-implemented-full-text-search-on-my-website

item.title: .NET Aspire: A Game-Changer for Cloud-Native Development?
item.description: .NET Aspire promises to revolutionize cloud-native development for .NET applications, but does it live up to the hype? In this hands-on review, I'll share my experience migrating a real project to Aspire, exploring its strengths, limitations, and potential impact on how we build distributed systems. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/dotnet-aspire-a-game-changer-for-cloud-native-development
